titles.title: Funding DNA Technology Initiative Act of 2009
A bill to authorize funding for the Advancing Justice through DNA Technology initiative.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Introduced. Funding DNA Technology Initiative Act of 2009 - Authorizes appropriations for FY2010-FY2011 for the Advancing Justice through DNA Technology initiative.
